caseTitle: Hai Zarwar Khan (decd) thr. LRs & others v. Haji Rehman Bangash & another
tagline: Order XVIII, Rule 4, C.P.C. provides that the evidence of the witnesses in attendance shall be taken orally in open Court in the presence and under the personal direction and superintendence of the Judge. It by no stretch of imagination provides for examination of witnesses who are not mentioned in the list of witnesses.
